channel.title: Godaddy Virtual Dedicated
channel.description:
Hey, whats up guys.
So me and a friend have decided to take on the task of creating a server, we both have around £100 - £150 each on paypal. and we are going to buy domain, hosting, dedi hosting, the lot! I'm looking into virtual dedication and the domain etc before we start programming the server, and i just want someone to verify that the following link is virtual dedication that i would use for my server..
https://www.godaddy.com/gdshop/hosting/virtual.asp?se=%2B&ci=7648&currencyType=GBP&cntry=UK&display=virtual
Please verify me, and if its not can you link me to a site which sells what i need please?
Thanks alot.

item.title: Godaddy Virtual Dedicated
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Hey, whats up guys.

So me and a friend have decided to take on the task of creating a server, we both have around £100 - £150 each on paypal. and we are going to buy domain, hosting, dedi hosting, the lot! I’m looking into virtual dedication and the domain etc before we start programming the server, and i just want someone to verify that the following link is virtual dedication that i would use for my server…

de.godaddy.com

Webhosting | Blitzschnelles Hosting und Einrichtung mit einem Klick | GoDaddy DE...

Zuverlässiges Webhosting von GoDaddy hält Ihre Website am Laufen. Inklusive einer 99,9% Uptime-Garantie und einem exzellenten technischen Support rund um die Uhr!

Please verify me, and if its not can you link me to a site which sells what i need please?

Thanks alot.
